Name: Heliotropism
About the game: Ever wondered 'what if I was a tree'? Seek no further, Heliotropism is here. In this rogue-like tree-building game, your goal is to last long enough to bear fruit in a harsh environment. Grow your tree, manage your resources, obtain mutations, mitigate crises and survive cold winters to get to the fourth year. Key Features Resource management : Grow your tree carefully, spending energy that you generate to place tree parts so that you can generate more. Just beware of winter: no energy and no leaves means that the tree is dead Evolve your tree : As you go through the game, you can collect a plethora of mutations that not only make your tree stronger but change the optimal playstyle to something unique every run. Unpredicted Challenges : Survive different crises every playthrough, from a small breeze to forest fires, these are coming after your tree. Plan ahead and mitigate what you can, survival is not an easy task To better suit your tree-growing needs, Heliotropism comes with: Weekly updates, every single Friday Customizable UI to fit your preferences. 4 seasons with different effects on your tree 100+ different mutations that buff up your tree in surprising ways 10 Different crises to beat, as well as a challenging winter every year 10 unlocks to enable even more content A vast underground filled with aquifers, rocks and sigils Hundreds of voice lines to keep you entertained while growing
